text:
K.A. Gunasekaran carved a niche for himself in the Tamil literary field.

Prominent Dalit folklorist and theatre personality K.A. Gunasekaran passed away on Sunday in Puducherry. Hailing from a poor Dalit family of Elayankudi, he is considered to be the first Dalit playwright. Page 7
title: Prominent Dalit folklorist passes away
